imdb.plot outline: Get Your Skills On is an exciting series of magazine shows for kids and families that celebrates, inspires and entertains and enables kids in urban active sports such as Skateboarding,BMX, Freestyle Basketball and Football, Street Dance and Urban Gymnastics Get Your Skills On is hosted by The Skills Crew,a best in class group of urban skillsters and world record holders.
imdb.title: Get Your Skills On
plot: _Get Your Skills On_ (qv) is an exciting series of magazine shows for kids and families that celebrates, inspires and entertains and enables kids in urban active sports such as Skateboarding,BMX, Freestyle Basketball and Football, Street Dance and Urban Gymnastics _Get Your Skills On_ (qv) is hosted by The Skills Crew,a best in class group of urban skillsters and world record holders.::Anonymous
